headline.main: AXIS ACTIVE ON FRONTIER; British Patrols in Stiff Clashes -- Malta Raiders Downed

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Nov. 10 -- Activity in the frontier area, which increases periodically when one side or the other takes the offensive, now appears to toe definitely on the upgrade after a brief lull since late in October. For the last three days the Germans, who recently had even avoided British patrols, have been sending out an increasing number of armored cars for reconnaissance and raiding.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
